alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 31 at 8:16PM CDT until November 02 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Louisiana and southeast Texas. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry
